Little Kids.description: Content suitable for all ages. Simplified Kids UI with restricted navigation.

Older Kids.description: Content suitable for older children. May include mild fantasy violence or thematic elements.

Teens.description: Content suitable for teens. May include moderate violence, language, and suggestive content.

All Maturity Ratings.description: No content restrictions. All content visible including mature/adult content.

content_descriptors.notes: Netflix shows content descriptors (e.g., 'violence, language') on title detail pages but does not allow filtering by individual descriptors. Filtering is tier-based only.

TV_Parental_Guidelines.notes: Full TV rating coverage for series

ESRB.notes: Netflix Games exist but use a separate rating system not integrated with profile maturity tiers

Common_Sense_Media.notes: CSM age ratings displayed on some titles as supplementary info but not used for filtering
